properties.comment: Model parameter definition ========================== Model : ServoMotor Type : Fanuc Alpha C12/3000 Parameters ---------- StaticFriction [Nm] Static friction of the motor KappaA [Nm/A] Torque constant of the motor KappaI [V/rmp] Speed constant of the motor ArmatureResistance [Ohm] Internal resistance of the motor PolePairs [-] Number of pole pairs AMPPower [W] Power consumtion of the amplifier and control if on AMPLoss [W] Heat Loss of the amplifier and control if on BrakeExist [1] Boolean value, indicates if a brake exist
